rules.title: FL Limitation
rules.lido: Please overwrite the MAX FL on Aircraft Operator  page Speed and Performance Tab(MAX Alternate and MaxCruise)

rules.title: TCAS INOP
rules.other:
No class E airspace, no KEF flights (at least below NAT HLA)
Max 10 days in EU, except Germany: 3 days rule. Other countries: check CRAR

rules.title: CPDLC INOP
rules.lido: Remove: from item10a:J1,J4                                                            Insert 10a: Z,                                                                                                   Insert item 18 DAT/CPDLCX
rules.other: Check CRAR amd OM C Airport Briefing

rules.title: ADF INOP
rules.other: Check  ADF requirement for DEP/DES/ALT airports

rules.title: ADS-B INOP
rules.lido: Remove: from item10b:L and B1,                                          Insert: H to item  10b                                                                 Insert: SUR/EUADSBX  item 18
rules.other:
SINGLE EUROPEAN SKY (SES): 
The 27 EU Member States ( Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, 
Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden) plus Norway and Switzerland (29 States in total).

We can operate with ADS-B OUT inoperative within SES for 3 days.
Restrictions for countries outside of SES should be checked in CRAR!

rules.title: BOTH GPS INOP
rules.lido: Remove: from item 10a:G, Remove:item 18  PBN:A1, B1,C1,D1,O1,O2,S2 insert: B3,B4,B5,C4,D4                  Remove: from item 10a:X,                                                 Remove:item 18 TCAS
rules.other: Please Check equipment requirement for DEP/DES/ALT airports For ADS-B see note on ADS-B inop for SES

rules.title: Dual VOR INOP
rules.lido: Remove: from item 10a:S, select n(Non-Standard Equipment)                                                                                             Insert L (ILS) and V (VHF RTF)                                                      Remove: from item 18 B1                                               Insert:B2,B3,B5
rules.other: Check CRAR amd OM C Airport Briefing

rules.title: Wx Radar INOP
rules.other:
Check the whole RTE and ALTN RTE for any hazardous WX condition (icing, turbulence, jet stream, etc)
Use both maps (most helpful is FL100-FL450)

rules.title: No Iceing Condition
rules.other: Check the whole RTE for any possible icing condition (icing areas, CB). Please, check also the TAF, SNOWTAM and METAR for DEP/DES/ALT airports

rules.title: ILS Category limitation   (Basic: CAT3B autoland cat 3A)
rules.lido: Please overwrite the Landing Capability on Aircraft Operator  page Equipment Tab (Standard Approach Equipment) according to MEL.                                       Overwrite: AIRCRAFT/DATA FOR ICAO FPL: RVR in item 18 For CAT I: 550m CAT II: 300m CAT IIIA:200m CAT III B : 75m

rules.title: (E)GPWS INOP
rules.other: Check OM  C Airport Briefing  for DEP/DES/ALT airports                     Example: FNC (Madeira)flight

rules.title: Center Tank Transfer Valve 28-26-01
rules.other: NO GO FOR  LONG FLIGHTS: FNC, TFS, FUE, LPA, KEF, DXB,AUH

rules.title: MCDU INOP                             22-82-01/02
rules.lido: Remove: from item 10a:X,                                                 Remove:item 18 PBN: A1, C1,L1,
